title: TikTok fined €10 million in Italy for insufficient protection of minors
description:
The Italian regulator AGCM has fined TikTok 10 million euros for insufficient measures to protect minors from harmful content. It was reported by the ANGA […]

title: Tankers carrying Russian crude oil, sanctioned by the US, dock in China
description:
